title: Bloomberg Markets Live From Atlantic City
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets Live From Atlantic City
description:
Carol broadcasts from Tanger Outlets in Atlantic City and is joined by Mayor AC Mayor Frank Gilliam to discuss the revitalization of the area. Jack Morris and Joe Jingoli, Co-Partners at Hard Rock, talk about bringing on bringing the Hard Rock hotel and Casio not Atlantic City. Bernard McSherry, Dean of the NJCU School of Business, on some of New Jersey’s top 50 companies. John Sartor, CEO at PS&S, discusses construction projects in Atlantic City. Jim Allen, Chairman at Hard Rock International and CEO at Seminole Gaming, discusses how legalized sports betting will impact casinos. Bob Zito, Founder of Zito Partners, explains the rebranding of Atlantic City.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
